Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) may play a crucial role in solving the energy crisis because they are clean and energy efficient.
Titulo: Computational and experimental analysis of Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Finding suitable cathode materials for SOFCs is key to facilitating their widespread use.
Titulo: Computational and experimental analysis of Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Besides developing high performance materials, understanding the stability and intrinsic properties of a material is equally important.
Titulo: Computational and experimental analysis of Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Herein, Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-delta (BLF) is studied combining molecular simulations and experiments on single crystal thin films.
Titulo: Computational and experimental analysis of Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Lattice dynamics simulations are applied to study the stabilization of barium orthoferrate BaFeO3-delta upon doping with La3+.
Titulo: Computational and experimental analysis of Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Simulation results reveal the defect energy for substituting one Ba2+ with La3+ in the cubic phase to be lower than that in the monoclinic phase, contributing to its stabilization.
Titulo: Computational and experimental analysis of Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Analogous results are also found by doping the Ba site with Sm3+, Gd3+ and Y3+.
Titulo: Computational and experimental analysis of Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the simulation results suggest that the charge compensation mechanism upon doping is filling oxygen vacancies and La3+ tends to trap the mobile oxygen anions.
Titulo: Computational and experimental analysis of Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In turn, as the doping level increases the oxygen anion diffusivity decreases, as is also supported by molecular dynamics simulations.
Titulo: Computational and experimental analysis of Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In light of this conclusion, single crystal thin films of La3+ slightly doped BaFeO3-delta, BLF, are grown on yttria-stabilized zirconia substrates using pulsed laser deposition.
Titulo: Computational and experimental analysis of Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The polarization resistance of the dense film is 0.07 Omega cm(2) at 700 degrees C in an ambient atmosphere, which is comparable to state-of-the-art Co-based materials.
Titulo: Computational and experimental analysis of Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells
